name: places/ChIJGafwP-VYwokRMhVQRPHlJjY
formattedAddress: 109 E 58th St, New York, NY 10022, USA
adrFormatAddress: 109 E 58th St, New York, NY 10022, USA

originalText.text: We specifically asked if we would be allowed to drop off our coats in our car later in the night, to which we were told yes. However, once we came back to drop our coats, the “overnight staff” of Dec 30-31 denied us saying that it was inconvenient to him in a rude manner. This completely went against their policy of 24 hour availability. I would not recommend this parking garage if you are parking for the night.

originalText.text: This place has so many bad reviews I thought I would throw in a good one. Yesterday I was looking online for a parking spot near the restaurant I was going to have dinner at, and through SpotHero I found a $19 special deal listed here, from 8pm through midnight. Great. Seeing the reviews I thought ok, this could be too good to be true, but I’ll try it anyway. Came in, the attendant ( Roberto?) was very courteous and I took my ticket, left the car. Coming back, I gave him my ticket and he scanned the SpotHero bar code on my phone and that was it. Car was out in seconds. All in, an excellent experience, for a price that you cannot beat in uptown Manhattan!

originalText.text: DO NOT PARK HERE. They will trap you as the other person said. Big letters a price before 10 am. I parked for less than 90 min. Come back almost double the price. No. The price is only if you stay for FOUR hours. On way out I see in little letters the disclaimer about the time. Never again.  They search your car too. Hmmmm.

originalText.text: Avoid this garage as they will trap you in their pricing. I thought I was getting the early bird special when i pulled in however they don’t give you the early bird if you stay less than 4 hours. If its less than 4 hours then you pay $65 dollars, double the early bird special.

originalText.text: Absolutely the worst experience ever. Park attendant was so rude and inappropriate. He berated me for not pulling up far enough, being in his way while standing outside of the car, being on my phone while pulling up my parking pass and WORST OF ALL, yelled at me for not tipping him! I've never felt so mistreated and can't help feel like he wouldn't have treated a man that way!!
